column1: Little Goat Diner////I have a group of girlfriends from college
column2: with whom i participated on the mock trial team (shut up
column3: I've embraced the nerditude) with whom I have brunch every few months. They're both still living in the city and far more city-savvy than I am
column5: one of them insisted on Little Goat Diner. The other gal is celiac and saw they had a gluten free menu
column6: and I had been dying to try one of Stephanie Izard's restaurants for ages
column7: so we were all on board. I made a reservation for 9AM last Saturday morning and waited in eager anticipation of an amazing brunch.
